services.name: New Year Special — 15% Off All Services
services.description: Start 2026 with radiant skin! Save 15% on all facial treatments, laser services, waxing, brows, lashes, PMU, body treatments, and more.
services.fullDescription:
Welcome the New Year with our exclusive promotion!

Enjoy 15% OFF on:
• All Facial Treatments (Express, Organic, Hydra Facial, Anti-Aging, and more)
• Laser Hair Removal (All areas)
• Waxing Services (Brazilian, Bikini, Full Body)
• Brows & Lashes (Microblading, Tinting, Extensions, Lifts)
• Permanent Makeup (Brows, Lips, Eyeliner)
• Body Treatments (Scrubs, Wraps, Detox)
• Chemical Peels & Advanced Treatments
• Makeup Services

**Promotion Details:**
• Valid: January 12-26, 2026
• Automatic discount applied at checkout
• Book online or call (718) 841-9919

**Exclusions:**
This promotion excludes nail services and massage treatments.

**Terms & Conditions:**
• Cannot be combined with other offers or promotions
• Valid for new bookings only during promotional period
• Services must be completed by January 26, 2026
• Gift certificates excluded from this promotion
• Management reserves the right to modify or cancel promotion at any time
